title: Silver 5 looking for a good ADC to help and climb together
body: Hi I'm a support who needs a good adc to climb with, please only* add if you have a good win% match history with your ADC and we can try normal game and see how we do. No Bronze

replies.body:
What supports do you like to run?

Any you would like to learn or get better at?

> [{quoted}](name=Selegun,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QhUkqHM6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-05T19:30:02.744+0000)
>
> What supports do you like to run?
> 
> Any you would like to learn or get better at?

Janna

> [{quoted}](name=SithKhaley,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=QhUkqHM6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-05T19:45:41.657+0000)
>
> Janna

Cool.  Feel free to add me.  Only a bronze 1 right now but just havent sat down to grind ranked yet.

Or edit your initial post.  Thats an option too XP
id be willing to adc and climb with you.  im s3 currently. add me Zazinator
